Little Women

Rank: 236


In 19th century Massachusetts- the March sisters--Meg- Jo- Beth- and Amy--on the threshold of womanhood- go through many ups and downs in life and endeavor to make important decisions about their futures.


Director: Greta Gerwig

Writer: Greta Gerwig, Louisa May Alcott

Stars: Saoirse Ronan, Emma Watson, Florence Pugh

Tags: Coming,of,Age, Costume Drama, Holiday Romance, Period Drama, Teen Drama, Teen Romance, Drama, Romance
